basicInfo.name: Melia
basicInfo.flavor: As war broke out over the Power of Destruction, the dragons distanced themselves from the humans. But because of her fondness for human children, Melia didn't hide herself away so she could keep in touch with and spend time with them.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Magic Attack plus 35% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: 30% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 6 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Chance: Crystal Cluster chance becomes 35%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crystal Cluster hit count becomes 5.

Skill 1.name: Crystal Dragon's Mirrors
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Magic Attack plus 32% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: 50% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 6 Hit(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Crystal Resonance. [Reduced by: 4 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Chance: Crystal Cluster chance becomes 65%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crystal Cluster hit count becomes 5.

Skill 2.name: Crystalline Breath
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Magic Attack plus 32% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 4 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Increased Miss Chance to 48%.
 - Increases Chance: Crystal Cluster chance becomes 45%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Glittering Crystal Scales
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Enhancement - Crystal Dragon. [Always Active]
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - [Magic Bond - 4 Target(s)]: Grants Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Magic Vulnerability. [Always Active]
 - All Magic Allies
 - [Magic Bond - 5 Target(s)]: Performing any attack 1 time(s) grants a Barrier equal to 45% of the caster's Defense. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.
 - Increases Effect: Magic Vulnerability to 20%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Wieser, any sweet foods, pretty clothes, jewels, especially crystals
profile.dislikes: Jave, any bitter foods, anything dirty, lies, when things don't go the way they're supposed to
profile.story: As war broke out over the Power of Destruction, the dragons distanced themselves from the humans. But because of her fondness for human children, Melia didn't hide herself away so she could keep in touch with and spend time with them.

basicInfo.name: Melia
basicInfo.flavor: Wieser began training Melia to prepare her to inherit the Dragon's Authority. She excelled, easily passing through the necessary trials to become the future guardian.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 25% of Magic Attack plus 30% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: 30% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 6 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 25% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Crystal Dragon's Mirrors
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 27% of Magic Attack plus 30% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: 50% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 6 Hit(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Crystal Resonance. [Reduced by: 4 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 27% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Crystalline Breath
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 27% of Magic Attack plus 30% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - [Magic Bond - 3 Target(s)]: Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Crystal Cluster. [Ends After: Taking 4 Hit(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 27% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Glittering Crystal Scales
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Enhancement - Crystal Dragon. [Always Active]
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - [Magic Bond - 4 Target(s)]: Grants Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Magic Vulnerability. [Always Active]
 - All Magic Allies
 - [Magic Bond - 5 Target(s)]: Performing any attack 1 time(s) grants a Barrier equal to 40% of the caster's Defense. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Melia
basicInfo.flavor: When Melia lost her parents to the evil dragons of the past, she hadn't even been born yet. After her birth, she was raised under Wieser's care and grew up with a deep affection for Gaia.
